title: Multi-color Abstract Italian Glass Plate
description:
It's all about color with this abstract Italian glass plate.  Abstract shapes are painted on transparent glass before the first firing, creating an harmonious composition and color variations.   The  flat glass is returned to the oven for a second firing, this time on a mold which creates the definitive shape.  Signed by the artist.  Made in Italy.  Sizes and colors will vary.  

Approx. 8 1/2 square x 1  in. high
